Description: Why Patients Need You  Whether you are involved in the design and development of manufacturing processes for products or supporting maintenance and reliability, engineering is vital to making sure customers and patients have the medicines they need, when they need them. Working with our innovative engineering team, you'll help bring medicines to the world even faster by imagining what’s possible and taking action.  What You Will Achieve  The incumbent will support the E&I maintenance manager to manage the calibration/E&I activities carried out by Calibration/E&I Technicians to maintain site-wide instrumentation, control and upgrades/repairs to achieve high instrumentation reliability in compliance with cGMP, EHS, Data Integrity and regulatory requirements in a cost effective manner.  How You Will Achieve It  Manage and maintain the validated status of the EAMS maintenance management system by working with Quality Assurance team, Automation Information team, E/I maintenance team and vendor, on the data base, software and hardware validation. Manage and supervise a team of Calibration/E&I Technicians to perform instrument calibration and instrument maintenance activities (CAL, COR, and repairs) according to procedures, good engineering practices and cGMP. Perform day-to-day planning and scheduling instrument calibration and instrument maintenance activities to ensure smooth production. Develop instrument calibration and instrument maintenance program to maintain plant instrument assets. Review and modify the PM Calibration to improve instrumentation, control and reliability. Be the System Administrator /SuperUser on EAMS applications and conduct training to new user(s). Manage and utilize the EAMS as an effective tool to support the calibration team in compliance with cGMP and good maintenance practices. Maintain the quality and accuracy of data integrity of the EAMS system. Support manager to achieve financial objectives by preparing and controlling against approved annual maintenance budget; scheduling expenditures; analyzing variances; initiating corrective actions for instrumentation, control and repairs. Lead/participate in continuous improvement initiatives and support (IRS/QAR) investigations. Manage and maintain calibration Standard Operation Procedure (SOP) by generating procedures for the operation, review procedures, optimize procedures and training of procedures to the E/I calibration team. Manage and execute any modification and control of the calibration system in compliance with cGMP and good maintenance practices. Track instrument performance and conduct bench marking by tracking instrument breakdown, re-occurrence failure and instrument history report to enable Maintenance Team to focus on areas that required attention. Provide relevant operation and performance reports by generating reports on instrument maintenance work/PM statistics. Support maintenance operations and shutdown activities by working with Supervisor and Engineer on developing the annual PM plan, setting work priorities; scheduling PM activities, coordinating and resources planning to meet the schedule in cost-effective way. Implement and maintain calibration record filing system by keeping all calibration documentation records and reports for fast retrieval, audit ready and comply to cGMP requirement. Work with E/I Supervisor and Maintenance Planner to enhance maintenance activities on Global Reliability Program (GRP) / Preventive Maintenance Optimization (PMO). Coordinate between the E/I and Production team; Area owners and Maintenance Repair & Operation (MRO) store on shutdown activities and major maintenance jobs, plan and schedule calibration/PM work orders accordingly. Work with E/I Supervisor and Maintenance Planner on updating the Key Performance Index (KPI) established. Liaise with Production to support new product tech-transfer, project construction and commissioning through active involvement in commissioning activities; discuss instruments hardware improvement and modifications. Maintaining good working relations with team by working closely with E/I, Automation, Production and vendor in consultation with the team to resolve any issues. Support Project team on special / urgent assigned projects to meet the requirement, schedule and budget target. Maintain a safe and clean working environment on areas under one’s responsibility. Provide training (e.g. OJT) and coaching to colleagues to build-up their competencies. Participate IMEx Process Centric Team Tier 1 meetings and address engineering issues based on priority. Develop or support TPM-OPC checklists, train and coach operation team in OPC tasks and knowledge. Complete all assigned training on-time and also prior to work execution. Contribute to team effort by accomplishing desired results/KPIs.  Education/Experience  Qualifications  Bachelor's Degree/ Diploma in Engineering related qualifications Minimum 10 years of relevant experiences in pharmaceutical, chemical, or petrochemical industries  Pfizer is an equal opportunity employer and complies with all applicable equal employment opportunity legislation in each jurisdiction in which it operates.  Engineering

Why apply to Circles.Life?  Circles.Life is not just Your digital telco provider. Since our launch, we revolutionised the telco industry by seamlessly integrating both telco and digital lifestyle services on our Circles-X platform. Over the past years, we have captured more than 5% market share in Singapore, launched in Australia and Taiwan while attaining record breaking CSAT and NPS (+50). We were voted the Top Employer in Digital Telco and also became an accredited winner in showcasing excellence in workplace culture in 2019. It now employs 300+ people over 5 APAC offices. It is the portfolio company of Warburg Pincus and Sequoia.  As we’re growing to become the biggest and most loved brand, we are looking for: Web Product Manager.  Job Description  We are looking for a meticulous and driven individual with a passion for web and ecomm platforms. S/he will help support and lead the team in coming up with creative and technical web solutions and roadmaps, demonstrating solid strategic thinking and ideation skills built on relevant insights and learnings. They will develop and maintain the website platforms with the user in mind. The successful candidate will be reporting to Head of Product, Vipin Sharma.  S/he will take ownership from collaboration with stakeholders and business managers, design, delivery, quality assurance to performance, and be responsible for delivering quality standards of the platforms used by the business.  As a Web Product Manager you are an ardent customer advocate within the organisation., your responsibilities include:  Manage the web product roadmap and backlog for all markets Oversee and manage lead requirements, web feature development, and user acceptance testing Partner with the executive teams to identify key capabilities needed as well as identifying potential issues Partner with cross functional teams regularly to ensure alignment on feature development and project prioritisation per market Partner with development teams/vendors to manage the roadmap and backlog to ensure that the team delivers all capabilities on time and per expectation  We Are Looking For Individuals Who Has  3-5 years of experience as a Digital/Website Product Manager with relevant experience in startups/digital agencies scaling website platforms across markets Passionate about building great web products and solving customer and business problems Adept to fast-paced working environments Experience writing code languages, experience with back-end and front-end programming languages, such as Java, HTML, CSS, Angular JS, ReactJS is preferred Usability and customer-focused design experience is a must  Why This Role Is Unique  Create your own path - autonomy and freedom to define the vision of the role and be the one responsible to make it happen Close collaboration with team members - play a critical role in bridging gaps and thinking through hard problems with the cross functional departments to bring user feedback to the forefront and transform platform solutions 10X - Be part of a fast-growing organisation with ambitious plans to expand into multiple more markets and verticals, and help be the one to make it happen Unparalleled Access - Access to senior level relationship management with Key business partners, stakeholder management. Learning how to manage multiple and conflicting priorities
